entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:43 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
